title: font syncing
content:
Hi Guys!

I've been wondering for quite some time whether there is a satisfying solution for syncing fonts on two macs. I'm currently using FontAgentPro to keep my Fonts organized and I know that there is the possibility of a FontAgentProServer but that might be a bit over the top unless you're a design agency with 10+ employees imo.

Syncing the FontAgentPro Folder in the Userhome directory didn't work since the files have to be imported in FontAgent to appear.

Does anyone know any solution for this?

kind regards,  
mike
author: mikeb7
